content: lp ** 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp ** repeat from ** to ** to end of row ending with chain 1 treble_crochet in same lp chain 5 turn row 6 - 0n repeat row 4 and 5 till desired size ending with a row 4 repeat trims and edgings trim number 1 for the black shawl i used fun fur prints attach yarn to center back of shawl chain 1 single_crochet in same space *chain 2 single_crochet in next space created by chain 5 or treble_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in same space * repeat from * to * to corner of shawl chain 2 single_crochet in same space 2 times in corner st working down the side **chain 2 single_crochet in chain 3 space chain 2 single_crochet in same space chain 2 single_crochet in st between v st ** repeat from ** to ** to center point chain 2 single_crochet in same space 5 times in center point **chain 2 single_crochet in chain 3 space chain 2 single_crochet in same space chain 2 single_crochet in st between v st ** repeat from ** to ** to corner of shawl chain 2 single_crochet in same space 2 times in corner st working across the top edge again *chain 2 single_crochet in next space created by chain 5 or treble_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in same space * repeat from * to * to center of the shawl to add trim on the shawl count out ten row from center with right side facing you attach yarn to edge of shawl *chain 3 single_crochet in space between shell chain 3 single_crochet center st of shell * repeat from * to * to center point of shawl chain 3 single_crochet center st of shell 3 times in center point *chain 3 single_crochet in space between shell chain 3 single_crochet center st of shell * repeat from * to * to the next edge slip_stitch into edging and end off weave ends in 1 count down 10 more row and repeat 2 times you may find you want to change the number of row between trim to balance out your trim that will depend on the number of row you did to complete your shawl trim number 2 for rainbow boucle shawl attach yarn to center back of shawl chain 1 single_crochet in same space * 3 single_crochet in space created by chain 5 or treble_crochet on shawl * * repeat from * to * to corner of shawl 5 single_crochet in corner st ** 1sc 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space ** repeat from ** to ** to center point 1sc 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 5 times in center point ** 1sc 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space ** repeat from ** to ** to corner of shawl 5 single_crochet in corner st * 3 single_crochet in space created by chain 5 or treble_crochet on shawl * * repeat from *
